DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of the uremic toxin removal by haemodialysis either with a low flux or a new high flux cellulose triacetate membrane
DOC.brief_title: Uremic Toxin Removal With a New High Flux Cellulose Triacetate Membrane
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison of the uremic toxin removal by haemodialysis either with a low flux or a new high flux cellulose triacetate membrane
DOC.criteria: Chronic haemodialysis patient Serum albumin > 3.6 g/dl < 18 years
